name: FUEGO
description: FUEGO is The Deflationary Index Fund on Base. A decentralized, deflationary DeFi protocol generating real yield through DAO-selected blue-chip Base Chain tokens. Serving as both a utility and governance token, FUEGO uses deflationary mechanics and liquidity arbitrage to deliver sustainable income and long-term value to holders. In summary, FUEGO is designed to be a foundational, deflationary pairing asset on Base Chain that empowers token holders through DAO governance, protocol-owned liquidity, and sustainable real yield.
